title: The Blood of Lathander
content:
k of amber set into the handle of this luminous more supposedly holds four drops of godly blood fallen to the earth in a battle between an avatar of Lathander and a maddened Chosen of Mystra.

BG3 The Blood of Lathander Information

Lathander's Blessing: Once per Long Rest, when your hit points are reduced to 0, you regain 2d6 (2~12) hit points. Allies within 9m also regain 1d6 (1~6) hit points.
